code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./StressAnalysis.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function StressAnalysis(_ref){let{onClose}=_ref;const questions=['Have you felt overwhelmed by studies in the last 7 days?','Do you find it hard to sleep because of stress or worry?','Have you had difficulty concentrating during classes or study time?','Do you feel physically tired or drained most days?','Have you been avoiding tasks because they feel too stressful?','Do you often feel anxious about your future or performance?'];const[answers,setAnswers]=useState(Array(questions.length).fill(null));const[showResult,setShowResult]=useState(false);const setAnswer=(index,value)=>{const updatedAnswers=[...answers];updatedAnswers[index]=value;setAnswers(updatedAnswers);};const answeredCount=answers.filter(answer=>answer!==null).length;const yesCount=answers.filter(answer=>answer==='yes').length;const canSubmit=answeredCount===questions.length;const getResult=()=>{if(yesCount<=1){return{level:'Low Stress',message:'You seem to be managing stress well.
